name: 劉慧雯
objective: 多元英文系列課程以強化英語文實務及溝通能力為目標，提供不同主題內容及學習任務之課程。本系列課程整合語言技巧之訓練、專業內容主題之教授、及功能性之實務英文應用。課程設計主軸包括任務導向教學、主題式教學、及互動式語言訓練並導入多樣性之語言素材。修習課程前應詳細了解個別課程內容並評估個別英語應用之需求。
schedule:
Week	Content
Week 1	--
Week 2	Introduction
Week 3	The Little Prince – Capter 1-3
Week 4	The Little Prince – Capter 4-6
Week 5	The Little Prince – Capter 7-9
Week 6	The Little Prince – Capter 10-12
Week 7	Film Watching and Discussion
Week 8	Review
Week 9	Midterm
Week 10	The Little Prince – Capter 13-15
Week 11	The Little Prince – Capter 16-18
Week 12	The Little Prince – Capter 19-21
Week 13	The Little Prince – Capter 22-24
Week 14	The Little Prince – Capter 25-27
Week 15	Review
Week 16	Film Watching and Discussion
Week 17	Review
Week 18	Final
scorePolicy:
Grading Methods & Ratio:  
*Attendance & Class Participation 30%
*Quiz & Assignment 30%
*Midterm 20%
*Final 20%
